title: How to Play the Bionicle Glatorian Battle Game

steps.headline: Get a friend and your Bionicle Set.
Set up the field with two canisters (the boxes) and two matching figures.
Decide who goes first.
The first player must fire the Thornax.
steps.description: If it hits the figure, the opponent loses 2 points. If it hits the can, the opponent loses 1 point.

steps.headline: Wherever the Thornax lands/rolls is where the Glatorian has to move.
Continue until one player has no more points left.
steps.description: The other player is the winner.

steps.headline: Get a friend and 2 or more figures and cans.
steps.description: Be sure you both have the same amount of figures.

steps.headline: Set up the field with 4 figures and 4 cans.
Decide who goes first.
That player fires the Thornax two times individually.
Wherever the first Thornax lands is where the first figure moves.
Wherever the second Thornax lands is where the second figure moves.
steps.description: After that, it is the opponent's turn.

steps.headline: When a Thornax hits the can, the opponent loses 1 point.
When a Thornax hits the figure, the opponent loses 2 points.
Continue until one player has no more figures left.
Get a friend, a Glatorian and an Agori.
Set up the field with the Agori beside the corresponding Glatorian.
Decide who goes first.
Play as normal.
steps.description: The Agori should follow the Glatorian.

steps.headline: Each turn, the Glatorian can fire the Thornax twice.
When the Thornax hits the Agori, it is placed out and the Glatorian can only fire once.
Play until one player has no figures left.
Get a friend, and vehicle/creature.
Set up the field.
Decide who goes first,
Each vehicle/creature can fire twice.
Play as normal.
When a player as no more creatures/vehicles left, that player wins.
Gather 2 friends, a Glatorian and an Agori/Vehicle or Creature.
Set up the field.
Decide who goes first/second/third.
Play as normal.
Whoever wins is declared Champion.

text: Normal Way Get a friend and your Bionicle Set.  Set up the field with two canisters (the boxes) and two matching figures.  Decide who goes first.  The first player must fire the Thornax. If it hits the figure, the opponent loses 2 points. If it hits the can, the opponent loses 1 point. Wherever the Thornax lands/rolls is where the Glatorian has to move.  Continue until one player has no more points left. The other player is the winner. Multi-Figure Get a friend and 2 or more figures and cans. Be sure you both have the same amount of figures. Set up the field with 4 figures and 4 cans.  Decide who goes first.  That player fires the Thornax two times individually.  Wherever the first Thornax lands is where the first figure moves.  Wherever the second Thornax lands is where the second figure moves. After that, it is the opponent's turn. When a Thornax hits the can, the opponent loses 1 point.  When a Thornax hits the figure, the opponent loses 2 points.  Continue until one player has no more figures left.  Blockers Get a friend, a Glatorian and an Agori.  Set up the field with the Agori beside the corresponding Glatorian.  Decide who goes first.  Play as normal. The Agori should follow the Glatorian. Each turn, the Glatorian can fire the Thornax twice.  When the Thornax hits the Agori, it is placed out and the Glatorian can only fire once.  Play until one player has no figures left.  Vehicles\/Creatures Get a friend, and vehicle/creature.  Set up the field.  Decide who goes first,  Each vehicle/creature can fire twice.  Play as normal.  When a player as no more creatures/vehicles left, that player wins.  Big Battle Gather 2 friends, a Glatorian and an Agori/Vehicle or Creature.  Set up the field.  Decide who goes first/second/third.  Play as normal.  Whoever wins is declared Champion.
